biolockj.module.seq

Class SeqFileValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.module.BioModuleImpl
      • biolockj.module.ScriptModuleImpl
        • biolockj.module.JavaModuleImpl
          • biolockj.module.seq.SeqFileValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BioModule, JavaModule, ScriptModule

    public class SeqFileValidator
extends JavaModuleImpl
implements JavaModule
    This BioModule validates fasta/fastq file formats are valid and enforces min/max read lengths.

      protected void validateFile(File file)
      Validate sequence files: Validate valid 1st sequence header character is expected character Validate fastq files have same number of bases and quality scores per read Remove reads below minimum threshold: "input.seqMinLen" Trim reads if above the maximum threshold: "input.seqMaxLen" Invalid reads are saved to a file in the module temp directory for analysis/review.

               throws Exception
        Call validateFile(File) for each input file.

        Specified by:

      • validateFile

        protected void validateFile(File file)
                     throws Exception
        Validate sequence files:
        1. Validate valid 1st sequence header character is expected character
        2. Validate fastq files have same number of bases and quality scores per read
        3. Remove reads below minimum threshold: "input.seqMinLen"
        4. Trim reads if above the maximum threshold: "input.seqMaxLen"
        Invalid reads are saved to a file in the module temp directory for analysis/review.
        Parameters:
        file - Sequence file
        Throws:
        Exception - if I/O errors occur while processing sequence files
